name: Black Out (HyperBeam( [V.1.1]
description:
(THIS IS ONE OF MY FIRST GAMES) I haven't put it on this site until now, sorry if its bad, it was one of my first games.

Arrow keys or WASD to move, Space to shoot (There's about a 2 second cooldown so spamming wont work!), Shoot the enemies and try not to die
